artwork_providers.title: Artwork Providers
artwork_providers.description: Configure external artwork sources for slideshow.

data_description.media_folder_path: Local directory path containing artwork images (e.g., /config/www/frame_art)
data_description.bing_wallpaper_region: Region code for Bing wallpapers (e.g., en-US, de-DE)
data_description.bing_wallpaper_history_days: Number of days of historical wallpapers to fetch (1-8)
